definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Freezing damage is one of the majordisasters of the world citrus production.
sentences.chinese: 凍害是世界性的柑橘生產上的主要災害之一。

sentences.english: The main form of damage for retaining wall in Seasonal freezing region is caused by ice.
sentences.chinese: 凍害是季節凍土區擋土牆破壞的主要形式。
